availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Manuel Newton Dixon (Caldwell co., ky, laborer and soldier 20th ky inf,)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Virginia native. Son of Mary E. Dixon. Married to Martha C. Williamson Dixon. Father of Mary N. Dixon. Guardian of J. L. Roberts. Laborer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Served in the 20th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.). Died of disease in service at Munfordsville, Kentucky, on March 8, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 283B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Caldwell County Births.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0490.
